whole_object: When life gives you lemons, potatoes, and grapes, you don't make a salad; you make a still life photo that's a-peeling in all the wrong ways!
single_object:
- Kiwi: Don't envy me because I'm a little sour; I'm just kiwi to the core, and that's my superpower!
- Grapes: Feeling a little bunch of stress? Just relax and wine a bit!
- Pear: I'm not playing fruit favorites, but let's be honest, I am pear-fectly delicious!
- Plate: They say I'm quite dishy, especially when I'm serving up some good eats!
multi_object:
- Kiwi  
- Grapes  
- "I told the kiwi to stop being so fuzzy, but it just grape-fully ignored me!"  

- Grapes  
- Pear  
- "The grapes were feeling a bit vine, but the pear just couldn't find its pear-sonality!"  

- Pear  
- Kiwi  
- "The pear asked the kiwi for advice on how to be more a-peeling, but the kiwi just said to stay fruity!"  

- Plate  
- Grapes  
- "This plate is feeling a bit empty; it could really use some grape company!"

multi_object_dict.object_sentence: "I told the kiwi to stop being so fuzzy, but it just grape-fully ignored me!"
"The grapes were feeling a bit vine, but the pear just couldn't find its pear-sonality!"
"The pear asked the kiwi for advice on how to be more a-peeling, but the kiwi just said to stay fruity!"
"This plate is feeling a bit empty; it could really use some grape company!"
